EmailTemplate.name: TSE: AWS re:Invent-Las Vegas 11_26_18.004 Pre-Event: Email Invite 3 - 3a: Combin
EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, see you this week?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
I’m giving it one last chance to see if we can meet with you at AWS re:Invent. Click here <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/reinvent2018/external_request/0ce7a1]]> to schedule time to meet with our cloud experts to discuss elevating your AWS projects.
Turbonomic Workload Automation is trusted by 2,000+ customers across industries including 100 of the Fortune 500. See a snapshot of our customer community below. Click through to view more.
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/case-studies]]>
Meet with us for just 30 minutes at AWS re:Invent this week, and walk away prepared to optimize your AWS environment.
Please request a meeting here <[[https://turbonomic.jifflenow.com/reinvent2018/external_request/0ce7a1]]>.
Best, Catherine
